SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

javax.xml.bind.annotation.adapters
Annotation Type XmlJavaTypeAdapter

@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value={FIELD,METHOD,TYPE,PARAMETER})
public @interface XmlJavaTypeAdapter

Use an adapter that implements XmlAdapter for custom marshaling.

Usage:

Note to Reviewers: This annotation has been completely redesigned since JAXB 2.0 ED, 0.40. See XmlAdapter.

This annotation allows the use of an adapter that implements the XmlAdapter interface for custom marshaling. Example: See example in XmlAdapter

Since:
JAXB2.0
Version:
$Revision: 1.1 $
Author:
  • Sekhar Vajjhala, Sun Microsystems Inc.
  • Kohsuke Kawaguchi, Sun Microsystems Inc.
See Also:
XmlAdapter

Required Element Summary
 java.lang.Class<? extends XmlAdapter> value
          Points to the clsss that converts a Java value to a
